episodes.name: Fairy Tale
episodes.overview: Actress and TV host Adriane Galisteu recalls her first time meeting F1 driver Aryton Senna and the early days of their whirlwind, fairy-tale romance.

episodes.name: Metamorphosis
episodes.overview: Adriane recounts the immense criticism she faced after Ayrton's death. With support from friends, she eventually discovers her own path.
